| History                 = The ''New York Star'' is a newspaper in [[New York City]], [[New York (State)|New York]].{{r|Doc Samson Vol 1 2}} According to [[Dorothy McConnell (Earth-616)|Dorothy Walker]]'s fictionalized comic book series based on her daughter [[Patricia Walker (Earth-616)|Patsy Walker]]'s life, after high school both Patsy and her friend [[Hedy Wolfe (Earth-616)|Hedy Wolfe]] briefly worked there under editor [[Saul Morris (Earth-616)|Saul Morris]].{{r|Patsy and Hedy Vol 1 104}}

Years later, reporter Rudy Pinkerton investigated the serial killer [[Kyle Barker (Earth-616)|Patchwork]] for the ''Star.''{{r|Doc Samson Vol 1 2}}
